data.name: Valkyrie Spirits
data.detailed_description:
Valkyrie Arena is a minimalist turn-based tactics game about epic warrior spirits from different space-times. Create the best party combinations, adapt to the situations and use the best strategies to surpass each battle in the Valkyrie Arena!

Features:

  • Unlock many playable warriors from different space-times
  • Defeat the Valkyrie's challenges
  • Quick and very strategic tactical battles to participate

data.short_description: Valkyrie Arena is a minimalist turn-based tactics game about epic warrior spirits from different space-times. Create the best party combinations, adapt to the situations and use the best strategies to surpass each battle in the Valkyrie Arena!
data.supported_languages:
English*, Portuguese - Brazil*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or superior
  • Processor: 1.8GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon X600 XT or GeForce 6800 GT
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
